AT.name: PAC-MAN und die Geisterabenteuer
AT.description: Pac ist zurück mit einem großartigen Spielehit für eine ganz neue Fan-Generation. Erlebe eine Story, inspiriert von der heiß erwarteten Animationsserie PAC-MAN und die Geisterabenteuer aus der Feder von Avi Arad, dem gefeierten Regisseur und Gründer der Marvel Studios, und spiele die darin vorkommenden bezaubernden Charaktere. Pac und seine besten Freunde Spiral und Zylindria wollen ihre Heimat beschützen, während sie für Freundschaft, Freiheit und Zukunft kämpfen!

AU.name: PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
AU.description: Pac is back in an all-new experience for a whole new generation of fans. Featuring an original storyline inspired by the show as well as all the charming characters from the highly anticipated PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures animated series created and produced by Avi Arad, acclaimed director and founder of Marvel Studios. Pac and his 2 best friends, Spiral and Cylindria, rise to the challenge of protecting their home, all the while fighting for: Friendship, Freedom and the Future!

BG.name: PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
BG.description: Pac is back in an all-new experience for a whole new generation of fans. Featuring an original storyline inspired by the show as well as all the charming characters from the highly anticipated PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures animated series created and produced by Avi Arad, acclaimed director and founder of Marvel Studios. Pac and his 2 best friends, Spiral and Cylindria, rise to the challenge of protecting their home, all the while fighting for: Friendship, Freedom and the Future!

BE.name: PAC-MAN et les Aventures de Fantômes
BE.description: Pac est de retour pour apporter une expérience inédite à toute une nouvelle génération de fans, avec une histoire originale inspirée du programme télévisé, ainsi que les personnages attachants de la série d'animation très attendue PAC-MAN et les Aventures de Fantômes, créée et produite par Avi Arad, le célèbre directeur et fondateur de Marvel Studios. Pac et ses deux amis, Spirale et Cylindra, s'apprêtent à relever le défi de protéger leur foyer au nom de l'amitié, la liberté et l'avenir !

ES.name: PAC-MAN y las Aventuras Fantasmales
ES.description: Pac ha vuelto en una experiencia completamente novedosa para toda una nueva generación de fans. El juego incluye una trama original inspirada en el programa y todos los personajes de la esperadísima serie de dibujos animados PAC-MAN y las Aventuras Fantasmales, que ha creado y producido Avi Arad, el aclamado director y fundador de Marvel Studios. Pac y sus dos mejores amigos, Espiral y Cilindra, se enfrentan al reto de proteger su hogar mientras luchan por la amistad, la libertad y el futuro.

IT.name: PAC-MAN e le Avventure Mostruose
IT.description: Pac è tornato per conquistare una nuova generazione di fan! Scoprite una storia originale, basata sul cartone animato e sui fantastici personaggi dell'attesissima serie animata "PAC-MAN e le Avventure Mostruose", creata e prodotta da Avi Arad, regista e fondatore dei Marvel Studios. Pac e i suoi due migliori amici, Spirale e Cilindria, entrano in azione per proteggere la loro casa mentre combattono in nome dell'amicizia, della libertà e del futuro!

NL.name: PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
NL.description: Pac is weer terug in een splinternieuwe ervaring voor een nieuwe generatie fans. Originele verhaallijn gebaseerd op de tv-serie plus de charmante figuurtjes uit de langverwachte tekenfilmserie PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures, ontwikkeld en geproduceerd door Avi Arad, de veelgeprezen directeur en oprichter van Marvel Studios. Pac gaat samen met Spiral en Cylindria, zijn twee beste vriendjes, op pad om hun thuiswereld te beschermen en te vechten voor vriendschap, vrijheid en de verre toekomst!

NZ.name: PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
NZ.description: Pac is back in an all-new experience for a whole new generation of fans. Featuring an original storyline inspired by the show as well as all the charming characters from the highly anticipated PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures animated series created and produced by Avi Arad, acclaimed director and founder of Marvel Studios. Pac and his 2 best friends, Spiral and Cylindria, rise to the challenge of protecting their home, all the while fighting for: Friendship, Freedom and the Future!

PT.name: PAC-MAN e as Aventuras Fantasmagoricas
PT.description: Pac está de regresso numa experiência nova para uma geração de fãs completamente nova. Apresentando um argumento original inspirado no show, assim como todas as personagens encantadoras da tão aguardada série PAC-MAN e as Aventuras Fantasmagoricas criada e produzida por Avi Arad, o famoso diretor e fundador dos Marvel Studios. Pac e os seus 2 melhores amigos, Spiral e Cylindria, aceitam o desafio de proteger o seu lar, ao mesmo tempo que lutam por: Amizade, Liberdade e pelo Futuro!

RU.name: PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
RU.description: Pac-Man возвращается в ином обличии, чтобы предстать перед новым поколением поклонников. Вас ждет оригинальный сюжет и обаятельные персонажи, взятые из долгожданного мультсериала PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures, создателем и продюсером которого является Ави Арад (Avi Arad), признанный режиссер и основатель Marvel Studios. Pac-Man и два его лучших друга, Spiral и Cylindria, встают на защиту своего родного дома, одновременно сражаясь за дружбу, свободу и будущее.

SE.name: PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures
SE.description: Pac is back in an all-new experience for a whole new generation of fans. Featuring an original storyline inspired by the show as well as all the charming characters from the highly anticipated PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures animated series created and produced by Avi Arad, acclaimed director and founder of Marvel Studios.
